Organization: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA)
Request Description: 1. Records from January 1, 2014 to the present, relating to the February 14, 2014 recall of products of Rancho Feeding Corporation, Petaluma, CA (RFC). 2. To the extent not already encompassed within the above request, records from January 1, 2014 to the present, relating to inspections and investigations of RFC. 3. To the extent not already encompassed within the above requests, records from January 1, 2014 to the present relating to investigations into the relationship(s) between representatives, agents or employees of USDA and representatives, agents or employees of RFC. 4. To the extent not already encompassed within the above request, records from January 1, 2014 to the present, regarding the potential health risks associated with the consumption of RFC products recalled on February 14, 2014. 5. To the extent not already encompassed within the above requests, all communications between USDA inspectors and RFC, from January 2012 to the present. 6. To the extent not already encompassed within the above requests, all records relating to the slaughter and/or health status of the animals whose meat was the subject of the February 14, 2014 recall. 7. To the extent not already encompassed within the above requests, all records from January 1, 2014 to the present, relating to the potential health risk from the distribution or sale of meat products distributed without the benefit of a federal inspection. 8. To the extent not already encompassed within the above request, all records from January 1, 2014 to the present relating to the distribution and/or sale of milk from dairy cows slaughtered at the RFC facility.  REQUEST REFERRED TO FSIS.
